description:
Fix WidevineCDM binary name on Mac.

widevinecdm.dylib -> libwidevinecdm.dylib

BUG=180260
TEST=none

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=211341

messages.text: It seems we already use libwidevinecdm.dylib anywhere else (e.g. in gyp). PTAL

lgtm

https://codereview.chromium.org/5754053585797120/diff/5629499534213120/third_party/widevine/cdm/widevine_cdm_common.h

third_party/widevine/cdm/widevine_cdm_common.h:42: "widevinecdmadapter.plugin";
Should this one be "lib" too? What are others?

https://codereview.chromium.org/5754053585797120/diff/5629499534213120/third_party/widevine/cdm/widevine_cdm_common.h
